mapper.select: SELECT count(up_no) FROM reply WHERE up_no = #{up_no} GROUP BY up_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply VALUES (#{reply_no}, #{mem_no}, #{up_no}, #{reply}, TO_DATE(#{reply_date}, 'yyyy/MM/dd hh:mi') )
mapper.select: select t1.reply_no, t1.up_no, t1.mem_no, t1.reply, TO_CHAR(t1.reply_date) as reply_date, t2.nickname, t3.user_id from reply t1 inner join profile t2 on (t1.mem_no = t2.mem_no) inner join member t3 on (t1.mem_no = t3.mem_no) WHERE t1.up_no = #{up_no}
